name: Sacrificial Hero
description:
Sacrificial Hero - UE4 Summer Jam Game

Theme - Make It Count.

Your attacks cost health, killing enemies grants a small health boost. 

Make your attacks count, missed ones are wasted health.

Controls on menu screen. Keyboard movement, mouse aim, 1-3 abilities.

Team Name

Couchable Games

Team Members

Rhos Gould - couchablegamesdevs@gmail.com

Game Name

Sacrificial Hero

Content Prior To Jam

Sound of abilities - Soundly

ThirdPersonTemplate - UE
